data.title: Funny Text Generator
data.solution:
#Global variables
phrase = input()
method = int(input())
newPhrase = ''

#Type 1: Lowercase with spaces
if method == 1:
    phrase = phrase.replace(' ', '')
    phrase = phrase.lower()
    phrase = list(phrase)
    newPhrase = ' '.join(phrase)

#Type 2: Uppercase with spaces
elif method == 2:
    phrase = phrase.replace(' ', '')
    phrase = phrase.upper()
    phrase = list(phrase)
    newPhrase = ' '.join(phrase)

#Type 3: Alternating caps
elif method == 3:
    phrase = phrase.replace(' ', '')
    
    cap = False
    for i in phrase:

        if i.isalpha() and not cap:
            newPhrase += i.lower()
            cap = True

        elif i.isalpha() and cap:
            newPhrase += i.upper()
            cap = False

        else:
            newPhrase += i

print(newPhrase)
data.statement:
I want to input the text I want to turn into funny text, then a number from 1 to 3 designating how my text should be manipulated. In this case, I input 'Hello There' as my first input. From here on:

If I input 1, the text should have spaces between every letter (ignoring already existing spaces) and all letters should be in lowercase, like this:
h e l l o t h e r e

If I input 2, the text should have spaces between every letter (ignoring already existing spaces) and all letters should be in uppercase, like this:
H E L L O T H E R E

If I input 3, the text should start with a lowercase letter, then alternate between lowercase and uppercase, ignoring any spaces, like this:
hElLoThErE

You must ignore any special characters:
Lo,.rem #Ip]s[um ---> lO,.rEm#Ip]S[uM

Goal

I want to input the text I want to turn into funny text, then a number from 1 to 3 designating how my text should be manipulated. In this case, I input 'Hello There' as my first input. From here on:

If I input 1, the text should have spaces between every letter (ignoring already existing spaces) and all letters should be in lowercase, like this:
h e l l o t h e r e

If I input 2, the text should have spaces between every letter (ignoring already existing spaces) and all letters should be in uppercase, like this:
H E L L O T H E R E

If I input 3, the text should start with a lowercase letter, then alternate between lowercase and uppercase, ignoring any spaces, like this:
hElLoThErE

You must ignore any special characters:
Lo,.rem #Ip]s[um ---> lO,.rEm#Ip]S[uM
Input
Line 1: A string phrase for the text I want to be manipulated.
Line 2: An integer method for the way I want phrase to be manipulated.
Output
A single line with my manipulated text.
Constraints
1 ≤ method ≤ 3
length of phrase ≤ 100
Example
Input
Hello There
1
Output
h e l l o t h e r e
